00034 Image::Image ( ) : set( "sequenceNumber,rowVec,columnVec,sliceVec,coilChannelMask,DICOM/EchoNumbers" ), clean( false )
00035 {
00036     addNeededFromString( neededProperties );
00037     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionNumber" );
00038     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionTime" );
00039 }
00040 
00041 Image::Image ( const Chunk &chunk, dimensions min_dim ) :
00042     _internal::NDimensional<4>(), util::PropertyMap(), minIndexingDim( min_dim ),
00043     set( "sequenceNumber,rowVec,columnVec,coilChannelMask,DICOM/EchoNumbers" ),
00044     clean( false )
00045 {
00046     addNeededFromString( neededProperties );
00047     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionNumber" );
00048     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionTime" );
00049 
00050     if ( ! ( insertChunk( chunk ) && reIndex() && isClean() ) ) {
00051         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to create image from single chunk.";
00052     } else if( !isValid() ) {
00053         LOG_IF( !getMissing().empty(), Debug, warning )
00054                 << "The created image is missing some properties: " << getMissing() << ". It will be invalid.";
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 Image::Image( const isis::data::Image &ref ): _internal::NDimensional<4>(), util::PropertyMap(),
00059     set( "" )/*SortedChunkList has no default constructor - lets just make an empty (and invalid) set*/
00060 {
00061     ( *this ) = ref; // set will be replaced here anyway
00062 }
00063 
00064 Image &Image::operator=( const isis::data::Image &ref )
00065 {
00066     //deep copy bases
00067     static_cast<util::PropertyMap &>( *this ) = static_cast<const util::PropertyMap &>( ref );
00068     static_cast<_internal::NDimensional< 4 >&>( *this ) = static_cast<const _internal::NDimensional< 4 >&>( ref );
00069     //deep copy members
00070     chunkVolume = ref.chunkVolume;
00071     clean = ref.clean;
00072     set = ref.set;
00073     minIndexingDim = ref.minIndexingDim;
00074     //replace all chunks (in set) by cheap copies of them
00075     struct : public _internal::SortedChunkList::chunkPtrOperator {
00076         boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > operator()( const boost::shared_ptr< Chunk >& ptr ) {
00077             return boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > ( new Chunk( *ptr ) );
00078         }
00079     } replace;
00080     set.transform( replace );
00081     lookup = set.getLookup();
00082     return *this;
00083 }

00086 bool Image::checkMakeClean()
00087 {
00088     if ( ! clean ) {
00089         LOG( Debug, info )  << "Image is not clean. Running reIndex ...";
00090 
00091         if( !reIndex() ) {
00092             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Reindexing failed -- undefined behavior ahead ...";
00093         }
00094     }
00095 
00096     return clean;
00097 }
00098 bool Image::isClean()const
00099 {
00100     return clean;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void Image::deduplicateProperties()
00104 {
00105     LOG_IF( lookup.empty(), Debug, error ) << "The lookup table is empty. Won't do anything.";
00106     const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &first = lookup[0];
00107     //@todo might fail if the image contains a prop that differs to that in the Chunks (which is equal in the chunks)
00108     util::PropertyMap common;
00109     util::PropertyMap::KeyList uniques;
00110     first->toCommonUnique( common, uniques, true );
00111 
00112     for ( size_t i = 1; i < lookup.size(); i++ ) {
00113         lookup[i]->toCommonUnique( common, uniques, false );
00114     }
00115 
00116     LOG( Debug, info ) << uniques.size() << " Chunk-unique properties found in the Image";
00117     LOG_IF( uniques.size(), Debug, verbose_info ) << util::listToString( uniques.begin(), uniques.end(), ", " );
00118 
00119     // list should not be unified - they belong into their chunk even if they are common
00120     common.remove(common.findLists());
00121     
00122     join( common );
00123     LOG_IF( ! common.isEmpty(), Debug, verbose_info ) << "common properties saved into the image " << common;
00124 
00125     //remove common props from the chunks
00126     for ( size_t i = 0; i != lookup.size(); i++ )
00127         lookup[i]->remove( common, false ); //this _won't keep needed properties - so from here on the chunks of the image are invalid
00128 
00129     LOG_IF( ! common.isEmpty(), Debug, verbose_info ) << "common properties removed from " << lookup.size() << " chunks: " << common;
00130 
00131 }
00132 
00133 bool Image::insertChunk ( const Chunk &chunk )
00134 {
00135     if ( chunk.getVolume() == 0 ) {
00136         LOG( Runtime, error )
00137                 << "Cannot insert empty Chunk (Size is " << chunk.getSizeAsString() << ").";
00138         return false;
00139     }
00140 
00141     if ( ! chunk.isValid() ) {
00142         LOG( Runtime, error )
00143                 << "Cannot insert invalid chunk. Missing properties: " << chunk.getMissing();
00144         return false;
00145     }
00146 
00147     if( clean ) {
00148         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Resetting image structure because of new insertion.";
00149         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Inserting into already indexed images is inefficient. You should not do that.";
00150 
00151         // re-gather all properties of the chunks from the image
00152         BOOST_FOREACH( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00153             ref->join( *this );
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157 
00158     LOG_IF( chunk.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" )[3] != 0, Debug, warning )
00159             << " inserting chunk with nonzero at the 4th position - you shouldn't use the fourth dim for the time (use acquisitionTime)";
00160 
00161     if( set.insert( chunk ) ) { // if the insertion was successful the image has to be reindexed anyway
00162         clean = false;
00163         lookup.clear();
00164         return true;
00165     } else {
00166         // if the insertion failed but the image was clean - de-duplicate properties again
00167         // the image is still clean - no need reindex
00168         if( clean )
00169             deduplicateProperties();
00170 
00171         return false;
00172     }
00173 }
00174 
00175 void Image::setIndexingDim( dimensions d )
00176 {
00177     minIndexingDim = d;
00178 
00179     if( clean ) {
00180         LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Image was allready indexed. reIndexing ...";
00181         reIndex();
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 util::fvector4 Image::getPhysicalCoordsFromIndex( const isis::util::ivector4 &voxelCoords ) const
00186 {
00187     return  util::fvector4( voxelCoords[0] * m_RowVec[0] + voxelCoords[1] * m_ColumnVec[0] + voxelCoords[2] * m_SliceVec[0],
00188                             voxelCoords[0] * m_RowVec[1] + voxelCoords[1] * m_ColumnVec[1] + voxelCoords[2] * m_SliceVec[1],
00189                             voxelCoords[0] * m_RowVec[2] + voxelCoords[1] * m_ColumnVec[2] + voxelCoords[2] * m_SliceVec[2],
00190                             voxelCoords[3] )
00191             + m_Offset ;
00192 }
00193 
00194 
00195 
00196 
00197 util::ivector4 Image::getIndexFromPhysicalCoords( const isis::util::fvector4 &physicalCoords ) const
00198 {
00199     util::fvector4 vec1 = physicalCoords - m_Offset;
00200     util::fvector4 ret = util::fvector4( vec1[0] * m_RowVecInv[0] + vec1[1] * m_ColumnVecInv[0] + vec1[2] * m_SliceVecInv[0],
00201                                          vec1[0] * m_RowVecInv[1] + vec1[1] * m_ColumnVecInv[1] + vec1[2] * m_SliceVecInv[1],
00202                                          vec1[0] * m_RowVecInv[2] + vec1[1] * m_ColumnVecInv[2] + vec1[2] * m_SliceVecInv[2],
00203                                          vec1[3] );
00204     return  util::Value<util::fvector4>( ret ).as<util::ivector4>();
00205 }

00207 
00208 bool Image::updateOrientationMatrices()
00209 {
00210     util::fvector4 rowVec = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec" );
00211     util::fvector4 columnVec = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec" );
00212     util::fvector4 sliceVec = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec" );
00213     m_Offset = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00214     util::fvector4 spacing = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" ) + ( hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) ? getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelGap" ) : util::fvector4( 0, 0, 0 ) );
00215     m_RowVec = util::fvector4( rowVec[0] * spacing[0], rowVec[1] * spacing[0], rowVec[2] * spacing[0] );
00216     m_ColumnVec = util::fvector4( columnVec[0] * spacing[1], columnVec[1] * spacing[1], columnVec[2] * spacing[1] );
00217     m_SliceVec = util::fvector4( sliceVec[0] * spacing[2], sliceVec[1] * spacing[2], sliceVec[2] * spacing[2] );
00218     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Created orientation matrix: ";
00219     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "[ " << m_RowVec[0] << " " << m_ColumnVec[0] << " " << m_SliceVec[0] << " ] + " << m_Offset[0];
00220     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "[ " << m_RowVec[1] << " " << m_ColumnVec[1] << " " << m_SliceVec[1] << " ] + " << m_Offset[1];
00221     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "[ " << m_RowVec[2] << " " << m_ColumnVec[2] << " " << m_SliceVec[2] << " ] + " << m_Offset[2];
00222 
00223     //since we do not want to calculate the inverse matrix with every getVoxelCoords call again we do it here once
00224     for ( size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00225         spacing[i] = spacing[i] ? 1.0 / spacing[i] : 0;
00226     }
00227 
00228     //for inversion of the orientation we use boost::ublas
00229     using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00230     matrix<float> orientation = matrix<float>( 3, 3 );
00231     matrix<float> inverse = matrix<float>( 3, 3 );
00232 
00233     for( size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00234         orientation( i, 0 ) = m_RowVec[i];
00235         orientation( i, 1 ) = m_ColumnVec[i];
00236         orientation( i, 2 ) = m_SliceVec[i];
00237     }
00238 
00239     if( !_internal::inverseMatrix<float>( orientation, inverse ) ) {
00240         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Could not create the inverse of the orientation matrix!";
00241         return false;
00242     };
00243 
00244     for( size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00245         m_RowVecInv[i] = inverse( i, 0 );
00246         m_ColumnVecInv[i] = inverse( i, 1 );
00247         m_SliceVecInv[i] = inverse( i, 2 );
00248     }
00249 
00250     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Created transposed orientation matrix: ";
00251     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "[ " << m_RowVecInv[0] << " " << m_ColumnVecInv[0] << " " << m_SliceVecInv[0] << " ] + " << m_Offset[0];
00252     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "[ " << m_RowVecInv[1] << " " << m_ColumnVecInv[1] << " " << m_SliceVecInv[1] << " ] + " << m_Offset[1];
00253     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "[ " << m_RowVecInv[2] << " " << m_ColumnVecInv[2] << " " << m_SliceVecInv[2] << " ] + " << m_Offset[2];
00254     return true;
00255 }
00256 
00257 
00258 dimensions Image::mapScannerAxesToImageDimension( scannerAxis scannerAxes )
00259 {
00260     updateOrientationMatrices();
00261     boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> latchedOrientation = boost::numeric::ublas::zero_matrix<float>( 3, 3 );
00262     boost::numeric::ublas::vector<float>mapping( 3 );
00263     latchedOrientation( m_RowVec.getBiggestVecElemAbs(), 0 ) = 1;
00264     latchedOrientation( m_ColumnVec.getBiggestVecElemAbs(), 1 ) = 1;
00265     latchedOrientation( m_SliceVec.getBiggestVecElemAbs(), 2 ) = 1;
00266 
00267     for( size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00268         mapping( i ) = i;
00269     }
00270 
00271     return static_cast<dimensions>( boost::numeric::ublas::prod( latchedOrientation, mapping )( scannerAxes ) );
00272 
00273 }
00274 
00275 
00276 bool Image::reIndex()
00277 {
00278     if ( set.isEmpty() ) {
00279         LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Reindexing an empty image is useless.";
00280         return false;
00281     }
00282 
00283     if( !set.isRectangular() ) {
00284         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "The image is incomplete. Aborting reindex. (horizontal size is " << set.getHorizontalSize() << ")";
00285         return false;
00286     }
00287 
00288     //redo lookup table
00289     lookup = set.getLookup();
00290     util::FixedVector<size_t, dims> structure_size; //storage for the size of the chunk structure
00291     structure_size.fill( 1 );
00292     //get primary attributes from geometrically first chunk - will be usefull
00293     const Chunk &first = chunkAt( 0 );
00294     //start indexing at eigther the chunk-size or the givem minIndexingDim (whichever is bigger)
00295     const unsigned short chunk_dims = std::max<unsigned short>( first.getRelevantDims(), minIndexingDim );
00296     chunkVolume = first.getVolume();
00298     // Determine structure of the image by searching for dimensional breaks in the chunklist
00300     //get indexOrigin from the geometrically first chunk
00301     propertyValue( "indexOrigin" ) = first.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" );
00302     //if there are many chunks, they must leave at least on dimension to the image to "sort" them in
00303     const size_t timesteps = set.getHorizontalSize();
00304     const unsigned short sortDims = dims - ( timesteps > 1 ? 1 : 0 ); // dont use the uppermost dim, if the timesteps are already there
00305 
00306     if ( chunk_dims >= Image::dims ) {
00307         if ( lookup.size() > 1 ) {
00308             LOG( Runtime, error )
00309                     << "Cannot handle multiple Chunks, if they have more than "
00310                     << Image::dims - 1 << " dimensions";
00311             return false;
00312         }
00313 
00314         //if there is only one chunk, its ok - the image will consist only of this one,
00315         //and commonGet will allways return <0,set.begin()->getLinearIndex()>
00316         //thus in this case voxel() equals set.begin()->voxel()
00317     } else {// OK there is at least one dimension to sort in the chunks
00318         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Computing strides for dimensions " << util::MSubject( chunk_dims + 1 ) << " to " << util::MSubject( sortDims );
00319 
00320         // check the chunks for at least one dimensional break - use that for the size of that dimension
00321         for ( unsigned short i = chunk_dims; i < sortDims; i++ ) { //if there are dimensions left figure out their size
00322             structure_size[i] = getChunkStride( structure_size.product() ) / structure_size.product();
00323             assert( structure_size[i] != 0 );
00324         }
00325     }
00326 
00327     if ( sortDims < dims ) { //if there is a timedim (not all dims was used for geometric sort)
00328         assert( structure_size[sortDims] == 1 );
00329         structure_size[sortDims] = timesteps; // fill the dim above the top geometric dim with the timesteps
00330     }
00331 
00332     assert( structure_size.product() == lookup.size() );
00333     //Clean up the properties
00334     deduplicateProperties();
00335 
00336     // add the chunk-size to the image-size
00337     for ( unsigned short i = 0; i < chunk_dims; i++ )
00338         structure_size[i] = first.getDimSize( i );
00339 
00340     init( structure_size ); // set size of the image
00342     //reconstruct some redundant information, if its missing
00344     const util::PropertyMap::KeyType vectors[] = {"rowVec", "columnVec", "sliceVec"};
00345     int oneCnt = 0;
00346     BOOST_FOREACH( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType & ref, vectors ) {
00347         if ( hasProperty( ref ) ) {
00348             util::PropertyValue &prop = propertyValue( ref );
00349             LOG_IF( !prop->is<util::fvector4>(), Debug, error ) << "Using " << prop->getTypeName() << " as " << util::Value<util::fvector4>::staticName();
00350             util::fvector4 &vec = prop->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00351 
00352             if( vec.sqlen() == 0 ) {
00353                 util::fvector4  v_one;
00354                 v_one[oneCnt] = 1;
00355                 LOG( Runtime, error )
00356                         << "The existing " << ref << " " << vec << ( hasProperty( "source" ) ? " from " + getPropertyAs<std::string>( "source" ) : "" ) << " has the length zero. Falling back to " << v_one << ".";
00357                 vec = v_one;
00358             }
00359 
00360             vec.norm();
00361         }
00362 
00363         oneCnt++;
00364     }
00365 
00366     //if we have at least two slides (and have slides (with different positions) at all)
00367     if ( chunk_dims == 2 && structure_size[2] > 1 && first.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00368         const util::fvector4 thisV = first.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00369         const Chunk &last = chunkAt( structure_size[2] - 1 );
00370 
00371         if ( last.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00372             const util::fvector4 lastV = last.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00373             //check the slice vector
00374             util::fvector4 distVecNorm = lastV - thisV;
00375             LOG_IF( distVecNorm.len() == 0, Runtime, error )
00376                     << "The distance between the the first and the last chunk is zero. Thats bad, because I'm going to normalize it.";
00377             distVecNorm.norm();
00378 
00379             if ( hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00380                 const util::fvector4 sliceVec = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec" );
00381                 LOG_IF( ! distVecNorm.fuzzyEqual( sliceVec ), Runtime, info )
00382                         << "The existing sliceVec " << sliceVec
00383                         << " differs from the distance vector between chunk 0 and " << structure_size[2] - 1
00384                         << " " << distVecNorm;
00385             } else {
00386                 LOG( Debug, info )
00387                         << "used the distance between chunk 0 and " << structure_size[2] - 1
00388                         << " to synthesize the missing sliceVec as " << distVecNorm;
00389                 propertyValue( "sliceVec" ) = distVecNorm;
00390             }
00391         }
00392 
00393         const util::fvector4 &voxeSize = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" );
00394 
00395         const Chunk &next = chunkAt( 1 );
00396 
00397         if ( next.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00398             const util::fvector4 nextV = next.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00399             const float sliceDist = ( nextV - thisV ).len() - voxeSize[2];
00400 
00401             if ( sliceDist > 0 ) {
00402                 const float inf = std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity();
00403 
00404                 if ( ! hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) ) { // @todo check this
00405                     setPropertyAs( "voxelGap", util::fvector4( 0, 0, inf, 0 ) );
00406                 }
00407 
00408                 util::fvector4 &voxelGap = propertyValue( "voxelGap" )->castTo<util::fvector4>(); //if there is no voxelGap yet, we create it
00409 
00410                 if ( voxelGap[2] != inf ) {
00411                     if ( ! util::fuzzyEqual( voxelGap[2], sliceDist ) ) {
00412                         LOG_IF( ! util::fuzzyEqual( voxelGap[2], sliceDist ), Runtime, warning )
00413                                 << "The existing slice distance (voxelGap[2]) " << util::MSubject( voxelGap[2] )
00414                                 << " differs from the distance between chunk 0 and 1, which is " << sliceDist;
00415                     }
00416                 } else {
00417                     voxelGap[2] = sliceDist;
00418                     LOG( Debug, info )
00419                             << "used the distance between chunk 0 and 1 to synthesize the missing slice distance (voxelGap[2]) as "
00420                             << sliceDist;
00421                 }
00422             }
00423         }
00424     }
00425 
00426     //if we have row- and column- vector
00427     if ( hasProperty( "rowVec" ) && hasProperty( "columnVec" ) ) {
00428         util::fvector4 &row = propertyValue( "rowVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00429         util::fvector4 &column = propertyValue( "columnVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00430         LOG_IF( row.dot( column ) > 0.01, Runtime, warning ) << "The cosine between the columns and the rows of the image is bigger than 0.01";
00431         const util::fvector4 crossVec = util::fvector4( //we could use their cross-product as sliceVector
00432                                             row[1] * column[2] - row[2] * column[1],
00433                                             row[2] * column[0] - row[0] * column[2],
00434                                             row[0] * column[1] - row[1] * column[0]
00435                                         );
00436 
00437         if ( hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00438             util::fvector4 &sliceVec = propertyValue( "sliceVec" )->castTo<util::fvector4>(); //get the slice vector
00439             LOG_IF( ! crossVec.fuzzyEqual( sliceVec ), Runtime, warning )
00440                     << "The existing sliceVec " << sliceVec
00441                     << " differs from the cross product of the row- and column vector " << crossVec;
00442         } else {
00443             // We dont know anything about the slice-direction
00444             // we just guess its along the positive cross-product between row- and column direction
00445             // so at least warn the user if we do that long shot
00446             LOG( Runtime, info )
00447                     << "used the cross product between rowVec and columnVec as sliceVec:"
00448                     << crossVec << ". That might be wrong!";
00449             setPropertyAs( "sliceVec", crossVec );
00450         }
00451     }
00452 
00453     if ( hasProperty( "fov" ) ) {
00454         util::fvector4 &propFoV = propertyValue( "fov" )->castTo<util::fvector4>();
00455 
00456         const util::fvector4 &calcFoV = getFoV();
00457 
00458         bool ok = true;
00459 
00460         for ( size_t i = 0; i < dims; i++ ) {
00461             if ( propFoV[i] != -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() ) {
00462                 ok &= util::fuzzyEqual( propFoV[i], calcFoV[i] );
00463             } else
00464                 propFoV[i] = calcFoV[i];
00465         }
00466 
00467         LOG_IF( ! ok, Runtime, info )
00468                 << "The calculated field of view differs from the stored " << propFoV << "/" << calcFoV;
00469     }
00470 
00471     LOG_IF( ! isValid(), Runtime, warning ) << "The image is not valid after reindexing. Missing properties: " << getMissing();
00472 
00473     // check if there is a list in any chunk
00474     bool found=false;
00475     for ( size_t i = 0; i < lookup.size() && found==false; i++ ) {
00476         const KeyList lists_list=lookup[i]->findLists();
00477         LOG_IF(!lists_list.empty(),Debug,info) << "Found property-lists " << util::MSubject(lists_list) << " in chunk number " << i << " going to splice the image";
00478         found= !lists_list.empty();
00479     }
00480     if(found){// splice down the image one step if there are some
00481         const size_t relDims=lookup[0]->getRelevantDims();
00482         assert(relDims>1);
00483         spliceDownTo(static_cast<data::dimensions>( relDims-1));
00484     }
00485 
00486     
00487     updateOrientationMatrices();
00488     return clean = isValid();
00489 }
00490 bool Image::isEmpty()const
00491 {
00492     return set.isEmpty();
00493 }
00494 
00495 const boost::shared_ptr< Chunk >& Image::chunkPtrAt( size_t pos )const
00496 {
00497     LOG_IF( lookup.empty(), Debug, error ) << "The lookup table is empty. Run reIndex first.";
00498     LOG_IF( pos >= lookup.size(), Debug, error ) << "Index is out of the range of the lookup table (" << pos << ">=" << lookup.size() << ").";
00499     const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ptr = lookup[pos];
00500     LOG_IF( !ptr, Debug, error ) << "There is no chunk at " << pos << ". This usually happens in incomplete images.";
00501     return ptr;
00502 }
00503 
00504 Chunk Image::getChunkAt( size_t pos, bool copy_metadata )const
00505 {
00506     Chunk ret( *chunkPtrAt( pos ) );
00507 
00508     if( copy_metadata )ret.join( *this ); // copy all metadata from the image in here
00509 
00510     return ret;
00511 }
00512 Chunk &Image::chunkAt( size_t pos )
00513 {
00514     return *chunkPtrAt( pos );
00515 }
00516 
00517 Chunk Image::getChunk ( size_t first, size_t second, size_t third, size_t fourth, bool copy_metadata )
00518 {
00519     checkMakeClean();
00520     return const_cast<const Image &>( *this ).getChunk( first, second, third, fourth, copy_metadata ); // use the const version
00521 }
00522 
00523 const Chunk Image::getChunk ( size_t first, size_t second, size_t third, size_t fourth, bool copy_metadata ) const
00524 {
00525     const size_t index = commonGet( first, second, third, fourth ).first;
00526     return getChunkAt( index, copy_metadata );
00527 }
00528 
00529 std::vector< Chunk > Image::copyChunksToVector( bool copy_metadata )const
00530 {
00531     std::vector<isis::data::Chunk> ret;
00532     ret.reserve( lookup.size() );
00533     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> >::const_iterator at = lookup.begin();
00534     const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> >::const_iterator end = lookup.end();
00535 
00536     while ( at != end ) {
00537         ret.push_back( **( at++ ) );
00538 
00539         if( copy_metadata )
00540             ret.back().join( *this );
00541     }
00542 
00543     return ret;
00544 }
00545 
00546 size_t Image::getChunkStride ( size_t base_stride )
00547 {
00548     LOG_IF( set.isEmpty(), Runtime, error ) << "Trying to get chunk stride in an empty image";
00549     LOG_IF( lookup.empty(), Debug, error ) << "Lookup table for chunks is empty. Do reIndex() first!";
00550 
00551     if ( lookup.size() >= 4 * base_stride ) {
00552         /* there can't be any stride with less than 3*base_stride chunks (which would actually be an invalid image)
00553          * _____
00554          * |c c| has no stride/dimensional break
00555          * _____
00556          * |c c|
00557          * |c  | has a dimensional break, but is invalid
00558          * _____
00559          * |c c|
00560          * |c c| is the first reasonable case
00561          */
00562         // get the distance between first and second chunk for comparision
00563         const util::fvector4 firstV = chunkAt( 0 ).getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00564         const util::fvector4 secondV = chunkAt( base_stride ).getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00565         const util::fvector4 dist1 = secondV - firstV;
00566 
00567         if( dist1.sqlen() == 0 ) { //if there is no geometric structure anymore - so asume its flat from here on
00568             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Distance between 0 and " << util::MSubject( base_stride )
00569                                << " is zero. Assuming there are no dimensional breaks anymore. Returning " << util::MSubject( base_stride );
00570             return base_stride;
00571         } else for ( size_t i = base_stride; i < lookup.size() - base_stride; i += base_stride ) {  // compare every follwing distance to that
00572                 const util::fvector4 thisV = chunkAt( i ).getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00573                 const util::fvector4 nextV = chunkAt( i + base_stride ).getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00574                 const util::fvector4 distFirst = nextV - firstV;
00575                 const util::fvector4 distThis = nextV - thisV;
00576                 LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00577                         << "Distance between chunk " << util::MSubject( i ) << " and " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride )
00578                         << " is " << distThis.len() << ". Distance between 0 and " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride ) << " is " << distFirst.len();
00579 
00580                 if ( distFirst.sqlen() <= distThis.sqlen() ) { // the next chunk is nearer to the begin than to this => dimensional break => leave
00581                     LOG( Debug, info )
00582                             << "Distance between chunk " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride )
00583                             << " and 0 is not bigger than the distance between " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride )
00584                             << " and " << util::MSubject( i ) << ", assuming dimensional break at " << i + base_stride;
00585                     return i + base_stride;
00586                 }
00587             }
00588     } else  if ( lookup.size() % base_stride ) {
00589         LOG( Runtime, error )
00590                 << "The amount of chunks (" << lookup.size()
00591                 << ") is not divisible by the block size of the dimension below (" << base_stride
00592                 << "). Maybe the image is incomplete.";
00593         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00594                 << "Ignoring "  <<  lookup.size() % base_stride << " chunks.";
00595         return lookup.size() - ( lookup.size() % base_stride );
00596     }
00597 
00598     //we didn't find any break, so we assume its a linear image |c c ... c|
00599     LOG( Debug, info )
00600             << "No dimensional break found, assuming it to be at the end (" << lookup.size() << "/" << set.getHorizontalSize() << ")";
00601     return lookup.size() / set.getHorizontalSize();
00602 }
00603 
00604 std::list<util::PropertyValue> Image::getChunksProperties( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType &key, bool unique )const
00605 {
00606     std::list<util::PropertyValue > ret;
00607 
00608     if( clean ) {
00609         BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00610             const util::PropertyValue &prop = ref->propertyValue( key );
00611 
00612             if ( unique && prop.isEmpty() ) //if unique is requested and the property is empty
00613                 continue; //skip it
00614             else if ( unique && !( ret.empty() ||  prop == ret.back() ) )
00615                 //if unique is requested and the property is equal to the one added before
00616                 continue;//skip it
00617             else
00618                 ret.push_back( prop );
00619         }
00620     } else {
00621         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Cannot get chunk-properties from non clean images. Run reIndex first";
00622     }
00623 
00624     return ret;
00625 }
00626 
00627 size_t Image::getBytesPerVoxel() const
00628 {
00629     size_t bytes = chunkPtrAt( 0 )->bytesPerVoxel();
00630     BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00631         LOG_IF( bytes != ref->bytesPerVoxel(), Debug, warning )
00632                 << "Not all voxels have the same byte size (" << bytes << "!=" << ref->bytesPerVoxel() << "). Using the biggest.";
00633 
00634         if( bytes < ref->bytesPerVoxel() ) {
00635             bytes = ref->bytesPerVoxel();
00636         }
00637     }
00638     return bytes;
00639 }
00640 
00641 std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> Image::getMinMax () const
00642 {
00643     std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> ret;
00644 
00645     if( !lookup.empty() ) {
00646         std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> >::const_iterator i = lookup.begin();
00647         ret = ( *i )->getMinMax();
00648 
00649         for( ++i; i != lookup.end(); ++i ) {
00650             std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> current = ( *i )->getMinMax();
00651 
00652             if( ret.first->gt( *current.first ) )
00653                 ret.first = current.first;
00654 
00655             if( ret.second->lt( *current.second ) )
00656                 ret.second = current.second;
00657         }
00658     }
00659 
00660     return ret;
00661 }
00662 
00663 std::pair< util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference > Image::getScalingTo( short unsigned int targetID, autoscaleOption scaleopt ) const
00664 {
00665     LOG_IF( !clean, Debug, error ) << "You should run reIndex before running this";
00666     std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> minmax = getMinMax();
00667 
00668     BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<const Chunk> &ref, lookup ) { //find a chunk which would be converted
00669         if( targetID != ref->getTypeID() ) {
00670             const scaling_pair scale = ref->getScalingTo( targetID, minmax, scaleopt );
00671             LOG_IF( scale.first.isEmpty() || scale.second.isEmpty(), Debug, error ) << "Returning an invalid scaling. This is bad!";
00672             return scale; // and ask that for the scaling
00673         }
00674     }
00675     return std::make_pair( //ok seems like no conversion is needed - return 1/0
00676                util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 1 ) ),
00677                util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 0 ) )
00678            );
00679 }
00680 
00681 size_t Image::compare( const isis::data::Image &comp ) const
00682 {
00683     size_t ret = 0;
00684     LOG_IF( ! ( clean && comp.clean ), Debug, error )
00685             << "Comparing unindexed images will cause you trouble, run reIndex()!";
00686 
00687     if ( getSizeAsVector() != comp.getSizeAsVector() ) {
00688         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Size of images differs (" << getSizeAsVector() << "/"
00689                                 << comp.getSizeAsVector() << "). Adding difference to the result.";
00690         ret += ( getSizeAsVector() - comp.getSizeAsVector() ).product();
00691     }
00692 
00693     util::ivector4 compVect( util::minVector( chunkPtrAt( 0 )->getSizeAsVector(), comp.chunkPtrAt( 0 )->getSizeAsVector() ) );
00694     util::ivector4 start;
00695     const size_t increment = compVect.product();
00696 
00697     for ( size_t i = 0; i < getVolume(); i += increment ) {
00698         const size_t nexti = i + increment - 1;
00699         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> c1pair1( i / chunkVolume, i % chunkVolume );
00700         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> c1pair2( nexti / chunkVolume, nexti % chunkVolume );
00701         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> c2pair1( i / comp.chunkVolume, i % comp.chunkVolume );
00702         assert( c1pair1.first == c1pair2.first );
00703         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Comparing chunks at " << c1pair1.first << " and "   << c2pair1.first;
00704         const Chunk &c1 = *chunkPtrAt( c1pair1.first );
00705         const Chunk &c2 = *( comp.chunkPtrAt( c2pair1.first ) );
00706         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00707                 << "Start positions are " << c1pair1.second << " and " << c2pair1.second
00708                 << " and the length is " << c1pair2.second - c1pair1.second;
00709         ret += c1.getValuePtrBase().compare( c1pair1.second, c1pair2.second, c2.getValuePtrBase(), c2pair1.second );
00710     }
00711 
00712     return ret;
00713 }
00714 
00715 Image::orientation Image::getMainOrientation()const
00716 {
00717     LOG_IF( ! isValid() || ! clean, Debug, warning ) << "You should not run this on non clean image. Run reIndex first.";
00718     util::fvector4 row = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec" );
00719     util::fvector4 column = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec" );
00720     row.norm();
00721     column.norm();
00722     LOG_IF( row.dot( column ) > 0.01, Runtime, warning ) << "The cosine between the columns and the rows of the image is bigger than 0.01";
00723     const util::fvector4 crossVec = util::fvector4(
00724                                         row[1] * column[2] - row[2] * column[1],
00725                                         row[2] * column[0] - row[0] * column[2],
00726                                         row[0] * column[1] - row[1] * column[0]
00727                                     );
00728     const util::fvector4 x( 1, 0 ), y( 0, 1 ), z( 0, 0, 1 );
00729     double a_axial    = std::acos( crossVec.dot( z ) ) / M_PI;
00730     double a_sagittal = std::acos( crossVec.dot( x ) ) / M_PI;
00731     double a_coronal  = std::acos( crossVec.dot( y ) ) / M_PI;
00732     bool a_inverse = false, s_inverse = false, c_inverse = false;
00733     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Angles to vectors are " << a_sagittal << " to x, " << a_coronal << " to y and " << a_axial << " to z";
00734 
00735     if( a_axial > .5 ) {
00736         a_axial = std::abs( a_axial - 1 );
00737         a_inverse = true;
00738     }
00739 
00740     if( a_sagittal > .5 ) {
00741         a_sagittal = std::abs( a_sagittal - 1 );
00742         s_inverse = true;
00743     }
00744 
00745     if( a_coronal > .5 ) {
00746         a_coronal = std::abs( a_coronal - 1 );
00747         c_inverse = true;
00748     }
00749 
00750     if( a_axial <= .25 )
00751         return a_inverse ? reversed_axial : axial;
00752     else if( a_sagittal <= .25 )
00753         return s_inverse ? reversed_sagittal : sagittal;
00754     else if( a_coronal <= .25 )
00755         return c_inverse ? reversed_coronal : coronal;
00756     else
00757         assert( false );
00758 
00759     return axial; //will never be reached
00760 }
00761 
00762 unsigned short Image::getMajorTypeID() const
00763 {
00764     std::pair<util::ValueReference, util::ValueReference> minmax = getMinMax();
00765     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Determining  datatype of image with the value range " << minmax;
00766 
00767     if( minmax.first->getTypeID() == minmax.second->getTypeID() ) { // ok min and max are the same type - trivial case
00768         return minmax.first->getTypeID() << 8; // btw: we do the shift, because min and max are Value - but we want the ID's ValuePtr
00769     } else if( minmax.first->fitsInto( minmax.second->getTypeID() ) ) { // if min fits into the type of max, use that
00770         return minmax.second->getTypeID() << 8; //@todo maybe use a global static function here instead of a obscure shit operation
00771     } else if( minmax.second->fitsInto( minmax.first->getTypeID() ) ) { // if max fits into the type of min, use that
00772         return minmax.first->getTypeID() << 8;
00773     } else {
00774         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Sorry I dont know which datatype I should use. (" << minmax.first->getTypeName() << " or " << minmax.second->getTypeName() << ")";
00775         std::stringstream o;
00776         o << "Type selection failed. Range was: " << minmax;
00777         throw( std::logic_error( o.str() ) );
00778         return std::numeric_limits<unsigned char>::max();
00779     }
00780 }
00781 std::string Image::getMajorTypeName() const
00782 {
00783     return util::getTypeMap()[getMajorTypeID()];
00784 }
00785 
00786 bool Image::convertToType( short unsigned int ID )
00787 {
00788     // get value range of the image for the conversion
00789     scaling_pair scale = getScalingTo( ID );
00790 
00791     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Computed scaling of the original image data: [" << scale << "]";
00792     bool retVal = true;
00793     //we want all chunks to be of type ID - so tell them
00794     BOOST_FOREACH( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00795         retVal &= ref->convertToType( ID, scale );
00796     }
00797     return retVal;
00798 }
00799 
00800 size_t Image::spliceDownTo( dimensions dim ) //rowDim = 0, columnDim, sliceDim, timeDim
00801 {
00802     if( lookup[0]->getRelevantDims() < ( size_t ) dim ) {
00803         LOG( Debug, error ) << "The dimensionality of the chunks of this image is already below " << dim << " cannot splice it.";
00804         return 0;
00805     } else if( lookup[0]->getRelevantDims() == ( size_t ) dim ) {
00806         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Skipping useless splicing, relevantDims is already " << lookup[0]->getRelevantDims();
00807         return lookup.size();
00808     }
00809 
00810     LOG_IF( lookup[0]->getRelevantDims() == ( size_t ) dim, Debug, info ) << "Running useless splice, the dimensionality of the chunks of this image is already " << dim;
00811     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> image_size = getSizeAsVector();
00812 
00813     for( int i = 0; i < dim; i++ )
00814         image_size[i] = 1;
00815 
00816     // get a list of needed properties (everything which is missing in a newly created chunk plus everything which is needed for autosplice)
00817     const std::list<util::PropertyMap::KeyType> splice_needed = util::stringToList<util::PropertyMap::KeyType>( util::PropertyMap::KeyType( "voxelSize,voxelGap,rowVec,columnVec,sliceVec,indexOrigin,acquisitionNumber" ), ',' );
00818     util::PropertyMap::KeyList needed = MemChunk<short>( 1 ).getMissing();
00819     needed.insert( splice_needed.begin(), splice_needed.end() );
00820     struct splicer {
00821         dimensions m_dim;
00822         Image &m_image;
00823         size_t m_amount;
00824         splicer( dimensions dimemsion, size_t amount, Image &image ): m_dim( dimemsion ), m_image( image ), m_amount( amount ) {}
00825         void operator()( const Chunk &ch ) {
00826             const size_t topDim = ch.getRelevantDims() - 1;
00827 
00828             if( topDim >= ( size_t ) m_dim ) { // ok we still have to splice that
00829                 const size_t subSize = m_image.getSizeAsVector()[topDim];
00830                 assert( !( m_amount % subSize ) ); // there must not be any "remaining"
00831                 splicer sub( m_dim, m_amount / subSize, m_image );
00832                 BOOST_FOREACH( const Chunk & ref, ch.autoSplice( uint32_t( m_amount / subSize ) ) ) {
00833                     sub( ref );
00834                 }
00835             } else { // seems like we're done - insert it into the image
00836                 assert( ch.getRelevantDims() == ( size_t ) m_dim ); // index of the higest dim>1 (ch.getRelevantDims()-1) shall be equal to the dim below the requested splicing (m_dim-1)
00837                 LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Inserting splice result of size " << ch.getSizeAsVector() << " at " << ch.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" );
00838                 m_image.insertChunk( ch );
00839             }
00840         }
00841     };
00842     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> > buffer = lookup; // store the old lookup table
00843     lookup.clear();
00844     set.clear(); // clear the image, so we can insert the splices
00845     //static_cast<util::PropertyMap::base_type*>(this)->clear(); we can keep the common properties - they will be merged with thier own copies from the chunks on the next reIndex
00846     splicer splice( dim, image_size.product(), *this );
00847     BOOST_FOREACH( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, buffer ) {
00848         BOOST_FOREACH( const util::PropertyMap::KeyType & need, needed ) { //get back properties needed for the
00849             if( !ref->hasProperty( need ) && this->hasProperty( need ) ) {
00850                 ref->propertyValue( need ) = this->propertyValue( need );
00851             }
00852         }
00853         splice( *ref );
00854     }
00855     reIndex();
00856     return lookup.size();
00857 }
00858 
00859 size_t Image::foreachChunk( ChunkOp &op, bool copyMetaData )
00860 {
00861     size_t err = 0;
00862     checkMakeClean();
00863     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> imgSize = getSizeAsVector();
00864     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> chunkSize = getChunk( 0, 0, 0, 0 ).getSizeAsVector();
00865     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> pos;
00866 
00867     for( pos[timeDim] = 0; pos[timeDim] < imgSize[timeDim]; pos[timeDim] += chunkSize[timeDim] ) {
00868         for( pos[sliceDim] = 0; pos[sliceDim] < imgSize[sliceDim]; pos[sliceDim] += chunkSize[sliceDim] ) {
00869             for( pos[columnDim] = 0; pos[columnDim] < imgSize[columnDim]; pos[columnDim] += chunkSize[columnDim] ) {
00870                 for( pos[rowDim] = 0; pos[rowDim] < imgSize[rowDim]; pos[rowDim] += chunkSize[rowDim] ) {
00871                     Chunk ch = getChunk( pos[rowDim], pos[columnDim], pos[sliceDim], pos[timeDim], copyMetaData );
00872 
00873                     if( op( ch, pos ) == false )
00874                         err++;
00875                 }
00876             }
00877         }
00878     }
00879 
00880     return err;
00881 }
00882 
00883 size_t Image::getNrOfColumms() const
00884 {
00885     return getDimSize( data::rowDim );
00886 }
00887 
00888 size_t Image::getNrOfRows() const
00889 {
00890     return getDimSize( data::columnDim );
00891 }
00892 size_t Image::getNrOfSlices() const
00893 {
00894     return getDimSize( data::sliceDim );
00895 }
00896 size_t Image::getNrOfTimesteps() const
00897 {
00898     return getDimSize( data::timeDim );
00899 }
00900 
00901 util::fvector4 Image::getFoV() const
00902 {
00903     util::fvector4 voxelGap;
00904 
00905     if ( hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) ) {
00906         voxelGap = getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelGap" );
00907 
00908         for ( size_t i = 0; i < dims; i++ )
00909             if ( voxelGap[i] == -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() ) {
00910                 LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Ignoring unknown voxel gap in direction " << i;
00911                 voxelGap[i] = 0;
00912             }
00913     }
00914 
00915     return _internal::NDimensional<4>::getFoV( getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" ), voxelGap );
00916 }
